She claimed the water ring gave her son bigger lips for enhanced saxaphone bassoon, and the lobster salad she believed would make her son a genius. The mother was so enamored in an insular asylum in Florida and the boy, Bumbles has 5 jets, an island, a ranch, mansions and a sexy English barrister girlfriend. After the boy was taken into custody by officials and fed Rice Krispies and water, he was hallucinating out disappointed. He has almost off Joseph Stalin leather coat and returned to his daily servings of providing free sex education and birth control to friends (courtesy of Jack's Firestone luncheonette).

[Column 2]
throwing a fli and slamming, as it scared the schnooz of whitefish off. All beaches are flying a Coney Island Whitefish warning flag for the remainder of the swimming season.

Nickel Artist Arrested
By Lillian Pisher
Handup Town Magazine

Coney Island's Melvin Frombeholder was held known as 'High Mel' by police today. Mel had the uncanny ability to cut everything off a bathtub nickel, leaving only the bridge and the 'ring' surrounding it. Customers would emerge from all 5 boroughs and wait months to buy one of his hand-to-get coins. A local appreciative named Larry-fritzie Strietman, tried to pump Mel for information on how the extraordinary finger artist Frombeholder was insulted and became enraged. Mel Mel bared up to his name when he stabbed Strietman in the 'Stomach and Back up' in times. Ironically, Strietman was wearing a cheap copy of Mel's original 'No Hands Band' on his wrist when he was attacked. 'If it wasn't for the 'No Hands Band', said Strietman, 'I woulda been dead'.
Frombeholder is doing hard time, and can't hit outtakes 5 orders for the 'nickle baracas' without equipment for Mel's jew his tools. You'd better get in line. Mel Mel's is for 5 years and he won't be released on the prized buffalo nickels.

Beach Attack
By Lawrence Dyck
Sea Gate Observer

Lloyd Bridges 'Human Fish', a water monger, and a head to alert dad Hippo were attacked by a school of deadly Coney Island whitefish. The attack occurred last Saturday just off the Sea Gate Cabanas at Beach One. The enraged Hippo attacked Bridges indiscriminately and repeatedly on the faces and faces of the other victims. The 'Human Fish', and the water monger and managed a narrow father triumph in the seawater when they came close to his Hippo. The swimmers thanked the Hippo for
